name: Neutron (JustAyte)
description:
A remake of the Neutron board game made in Love2D.

Challenge your friends in this simple to learn, hard to master, abstract strategy game ! Source code is also available here :)

( There's no AI yet, it's only for local multiplayer )

Rules :

  • Each player first moves the neutron, then one of their pawns
  • Pieces move in all 8 directions, and continue moving as far as they can go
  • The game ends when a player succeeds to move the neutron to its row
  • Be careful not to lock yourself ! If the neutron has no possible move,  you lose !
